guide.intro: Hello! My name is Islam, I am a native of Samarkand and a professional guide. I have been working in tourism since 2010. I will gladly share the history of my beloved city with you.

transferTitle: Discover Uzbekistan for real with local guides

tour.info.title: Basic information
tour.info.description: Enjoy live communication and new discoveries every day on one of the most popular tours in Uzbekistan.
tour.info.description2: The classic group tour to Samarkand is a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the ancient East in the company of like-minded people from different parts of the CIS. You will get acquainted with the rich historical heritage of one of the oldest cities in Central Asia, walk through the streets where great scientists and rulers once walked, and admire the splendor of medieval architecture.
tour.info.description3: We are sure that Samarkand will leave a bright mark in your heart, and memories of this journey will make you want to return again for a long time.
moreThan5Years: More than 5 years of conducting tours
guideDesc: Hello! My name is Islom, I'm a native of Samarkand and a professional guide. I've been working in tourism since 2010. I'll be happy to tell you the history of my beloved city.
